entities: UN Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East
International Committee of the Red Cross
summary:
The Security Council,
Reaffirming previous resolutions 242, 338, 1397, 1402, 1403 and the President's statement of 10 April 2002,
Concerned by the dire humanitarian situation of Palestinian civilians, particularly in Jenin refugee camp,
Calls for lifting restrictions on humanitarian organizations,
Stressing the need to ensure civilian safety and respect international humanitarian law,
Emphasizes urgency of medical and humanitarian access to Palestinians,
Welcomes Secretary-General's initiative to gather accurate information on Jenin events through a fact-finding team,
Requests the Secretary-General to keep the Security Council informed,
Decides to remain seized of the matter.
